attributes.action: Significantly lower the existing rate of Vat on businesses, whatever the levels at present imposed,
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
and charge VAT on all products so that all businesses trade on an equal footing.
Restaurants are unable to claim on their food purchases as food is exempt of VAT but they have to pay on all their sales.There are many other sectors in sales that experience the same problem i.e.newspapers,childrens clothing,hire of transport to mention a few.A reduction to 10% from 17.5% on all existing VAT registered businesses with varying levels up to 10% being placed on all other presently unregistered businesses will be fairer and ultimately bring in more revenue for our ever needy economy.
